item.description:
Cindy N  will add all the info..

 

 Proceeds from this event will be donated to the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention! Donation is 10 dollars per person to get in! There will be bands (including the Beatles tribute "Because"), comedy, DJ, special guest bartender Jeannie (from Humphreys), and our awesome supply of drawing prizes. There were so many great sponsors last year, it was amazing!

A good cause, Great fun, great people.. All the ingtedients needed for a great night!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: ask for Cindy at the door

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The 2011 Southern CT Concert for Suicide Awareness
